content.detailedDescription:

content.summary: Again ufo caught in egypt after just after the first one by 8hours.Please back to our berivious report sent to mufon cms few hours ago.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been monitoring the webcam still shots from the hazecam.Com website.

this morning i captured and have been capturing a lot of activity of these ufo's from my computer.

might be a good site to set up and watch this activity if you want proof.
content.summary: Variety of activity at the jackson st. bridge in newark n.J.

content.detailedDescription: We were on our porch smoking a cigarette around 6:10pm in the evening i saw a flash out of the corner of my eye. when i looked i saw a bright silver circular shaped object flying north and not at a very high altitude ,but  way up there all the same. i watched it for about 20 seconds and it just vanished. my husband was outside but he didn't see it. when i first noticed it , it was shining very bright like the sun was reflecting off it there was a plane flying at a very very high altitude to the left of it.The plane was flying southbound. the plane was putting out contrails in a dotted line pattern,for lack of a better way to describe it. i've been seeing this thing for years. most times when i have a daylight hour sighting of it , it will dart out from behind a cloud and then back behind the cloud really fast , it is almost as if it knows it's been spotted. but today the only cloud cover we had was the contrail clouds , some in lines beside each other and some x like patterns. we have those all the time here in tuscaloosa also. anyway i watched it for about 20 seconds and it just vanished right before my eyes. if anyone knows what these things are feel free to e-mail me. i have tried to get local authorities and the local airport to check into and they have written me off as a nutcase. i am 37 years old i have no desire to be noticed over this and i am not looking for money or fame . the fact is it scares the hell out of me thinking that something is flying around up there and no one seems to care. i won't be flying anymore , it's not safe because these things sometimes seem to follow the air traffic that fly's over here leaving or headed to  the birmingham airport. when i see them it gives me a really really bad feeling. i started watching the skies in 1993 when i saw a reddish orange and silent object fly right over the tree tops beside my house. this silver thing is also silent.And at night it sometimes not always though shines a very intense white light in a sweeping pattern towards the ground. i really scares me and to me it is a ufo because i do not know what it is . it looks nothing like anything i've ever seen in person or on tv.
content.summary: It was northbound at a high rate of speed, an airplane was flying at a very high altitude above and to the left of it

content.detailedDescription: Walking east to west just after 11:00 pm mdt when i watched a green object shoot across the sky in a downward trajectory (not straight down, more like across the sky disappearing from my view at about 4 o'clock), with some red, and sparks appeared to be emanating from it. the whole sighting took less than 10 seconds. i could not help but notice it.  at first i thought it might be a shooting star, but it was way too close for that.  then it ocurred to me to be a meteorite. or perhaps a remnant of some fireoworks.  i have no pictures.
content.summary: Falling object from south to north, largely green with some red as it disappeared from view. seemed to have sparks coming from it

content.detailedDescription: I have reported these object previously however tonight the sighting was unique in that there were two witnesses.  up to nine unusually shaped glowing white objects materialized in the eastern sky going at high rate of speed 500mph at least.  objects appeared to witness for up to 10 seconds before fading out. objects seemed to alter positions in this formation. no noise was heard.  i have seen these objects mutiple times
content.summary: Multiple objects in formation

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend, two other friends, and myself had stepped out in the backyard to have a smoke. my girlfriend and i were looking up to the north and i was showing her how to find the north star by running a line off the lip of the big dipper's ladle. 

i suddenly saw a moving light in the right(east) corner of my field of vision. i assumed it was a satellite and looked over at it to get a better look as i usually do when i spot a satellite. once i had focused on it, i realized it wasn't a satellite because it was low to the ground and there was three dim reddish lights in the shape of a triangle. the object was moving at a high rate of speed comparable to a snowbird or blue eagle jetplane passing overhead. i know this because when the snowbirds are in town they have to fly over my house to get from the airport to the lake where they perform their act. 

at this point i was confused as to what i was seeing and excited by the possibility of what it might be. i immediately spoke up in an attempt to get everyone's attention and get them to look at it. since my girlfriend was already looking up at the big dipper and the object was moving in a straight line through her field of vision, she quickly saw it and was as excited as i was at seeing something so strange. 

as the object passed directly over us, i noticed how it made absolutely no noise. i found this strange considering it was so low and moving at such a high speed. normally aircraft, planes and helicopters alike, produce noise, and at that level it would have been very loud if it was a jet. also, the object was small, as it would have been hidden behind my fist held in front of my face at arms length. when the object was moving past directly overhead, i noticed that as it passed in front of a star, that i could still see the star in the center of but it was a blurred image, as if the object was semi-transparent.

we attempted to point the craft out to our other two friends but it was quickly heading off in an eastern direction and they were not able to locate it. when the object was about a quarter mile away, the three lights began to spin in a clockwise direction, then the began to zigzag in and out from the central point. suddenly the three lights all merged in the center and then vanished. no sight of it was seen after that. my girlfriend and i were both very excited about what we had just witnessed and began describing it to our friends in as much detail as we could. we both had the exact same desciption of what had happened.

unfortunately this all occured in the span of roughly 20 seconds or so, and there was not enough time for any of us to run in the house and find my slr or my video camera. it's a shame because my video camera does high res video and i would have got a great video of it.
content.summary: Low altitude, high speed fly by directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Hello to every one,
from cairo egypt ,this is again dr.Ibrahim ,founder and directot of web site :- www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org

just hours ago ,before i could have a time for full study,i caught the ufo here in cairo together with the moon (cresent shape) following its orbit from southeast to northwest on the way heading giza pyramids.
the fotoes is very clear that was a big different betwen ufo and moon.
may be my fotoes are not very clear ,as in hurry i took it through my cellphone camera from my tv screen in which was conected to my video camera
but the actuel video tape is crystal clear.
the duration of recording time was thrity one minutes on one tape.
here i can only send some urgent photoes ,as your system seems not accepting videos films any more as it was before.

just some thing i want to add to my report,it was also an airplane(commercial) passing-by heading to cairo international airport in a lower altitude as preparing to land (distance to airport around 30 kilometers).
the airliner not affected atall by passing in a lower altitude of the ufo,but noticed that the shape of the ufo changed after aircraft passing under it,it was very clear and recorded in my video tape .

many thanks again ,soon i will instale extra information and details on my web site,www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org

with my best wishes to every one and regards from egypt.Dr.Ibrahim
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were standing outside in our fields and for some reason we looked up, i forget why. about three seconds after looking straight up we saw a trail of twinkling golden colored lights spread out from north to south in the shape of a rectangle. it appeared for a few seconds and then just vanished. it was not a commercial plane, the lights just went on and off with a width of about 5 inches (if measuring from ground perspective). i would say it was about 45,000 ft. in the air. we just ran inside freaked out. we never really had sight of the object, just the trail and it just vanished.
content.summary: Never saw ufo - was at night - only saw trail

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i where sitting on the steps of or house looking southe west . when we saw a multi colored light in the evening sky. at first we thought it to be a bright twinkling star but as the rest of the night sky went by this little bright light stayed in the same location for over two hours. we where looking through a big leafless maple tree so it was easy to come back and line the object up right where it stayed until we went to bed.I would estimate the ufo was many miles away and not something stuck in the tree to far off to estimate a shape but the lights comming from it where like that of a diamond in the sunlight that would catch your eye. i also beleive when i was around 6,7 years old that i was visited and had a rather nice time being led, floating around the area. i'mnot sure if you want to hear about 40 years ago but it is still vivd if any one would like to listne to that. it was before i had even heard of a ufo.

matthew laclaire.
content.summary: Free standing motionless for over two hours. emiting diamond like quality

content.detailedDescription:
I was just outside of my apartment in pullman, wa having a smoke break from studying for finals.  i heard a plane nearby, and i saw it was a large military cargo jet.  around this time of year, they conduct multiple training ops at low elevations etc.  

anyways, i decided to keep looking up, and as i was looking nnw, i saw a small black object moving s really fast in a straight line.  it was about a half mile away over a hill/neighborhood, maybe 200-300 ft elevation, and i would estimate it to be travelling around 100mph.  at first i thought it was a local hawk that chills on a street lamp looking for food, but when i didnt see its wings flap, and i realized how fast it was moving i payed closer attention.  i watched it turn around, and head n, then it came ene towards my location.  the closest it got to me was probably 500ft, then it went back to a ssw heading, it gained elevation, and dissapeared into a cloud.  i'd say the object was about 20ft in circumference, black, perfect sphere, moved very fluidly, silent, and had no reflection from the sun.  it wasnt a jet, nor a bird.
content.summary: Black orb in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on the deck facing south on a beautiful cloudless october 14th 2005 day. when i turned my head to the left which would be to the east northeast i saw this football shaped shinny object moving north to south at about 200 mph and at a hight of about 1500 to 2000 ft. it was flying at a level which was constant and was totally silent. it was going so slow that i had time to call my wife out to see it which she did. i asked her what that was and she said "i don't know but it's not and airplane". it was only visable for about a minute but it was close enough to us that we could see that it had no wings ,windows,engines,and made absolutely no sound.It just flew out of sight.

in october of 2006 on a clear day i was sitting on the same deck and looking south i saw the contrail of a very high flying plane. it was so high that i could not see the aircraft so i went into the house and brought out my binoculars to see what kind of plane it was. as i was looking at the plane this very same football shaped craft flew through my field of vision going very, very, fast and upwards at about 15 degrees.In my estimation it was going between 3 and 4 thousand mph and was traveling north to south. it was an impressive thing to watch. if we have any craft like these then we should not be going into space on the shuttle. i might add also that i worked for a major airline for 27 yrs and am quite familiar with many kinds of aircraft and their characteristics including the sst.
content.summary: No sound,wings,windows,stabilizer,engines,traveling north to south at1500 to2000 ft about  250 mph .      t

content.detailedDescription:
After seeing this triangular object on monday april 9th, i returned the following monday, april 16th and managed to film it.  i have over 5 minutes of footage of the craft.  it was silent, had no faa lights, it had 3 bright blue lights on it's rear, a red light in the bottom center, and a bright white light on the front.  the video has been uploaded to youtube at http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=fwr_gd4r32q .

i first witnessed the object at 10:04 pm at jean klock park benton harbor while in the parking lot looking at my friends engine.  the second time was on the bridge on lake court road, and the third (which i video taped) was at lion's park beach saint joseph mi.  all the times i lost sight of the object it flew out of my view over lake michigan.  all the sightings happened within the same relative time.

my reactions were nothing but ambitious to get watch it as long as i could.  i knew it wasnt anything conventional, and i have heard of many other sightings similar to this one.
content.summary: Classic black triangle flew overhead, and headed towards chicago over lake michigan.

content.detailedDescription: At around quarter past 12 at night some blue flashes lit up the sky, so went outside and saw 3 or 4 blue flashes gliding across the sky. every now and then they would glow brighter and then they stopped and glowed white and they were gone.
content.summary: Some blue flashes in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At about half past one in the morning, i noticed a small but bright flash out my window. i went out to my back garden and looked up and saw something that i can only describe as a ufo. it was quite high up, not moving, but it glowed a blueish tint every few seconds. i went back inside to get some binoculars and i could see that the object was a disc, and it was spinning as well. it still didnt move and as i watched it, it moved slowly from right to left, glowing slighly brighter as it went. no noise came from the object, and the sky was clear enough for me to watch it as it went all the over the trees behind my house. it stopped, glowed bright white, and then it was just gone. it vanished. has anyone else seen these discs? i was shocked to see it, and i didn't  really realize wot it was until it was gone. the whole thing lasted about 10minutes.
content.summary: Strange blue disc seen over burntwood

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice clear night on the east side of detroit, the moon was waxing in the west. i had just picked up my friend from his house, and as we turned a corner looking ese we simultaneously said "whoa!". nearly stationary in front of us at about 1,000 feet over lake st. clair was a formation of lights. there were 5 of them in a line at about a 45 degree angle, as if an airliner was banking in front of us with an array of lights on it's wings. the center light was the brightest. we followed the same direction and watched as the craft banked north to our left and it's bottom faced us. what we both saw was a triangle of yellow lights with a white flashing light at it's rear. as it headed north, light after light went out until there were two blue lights at it's tips and then it disappeared past the trees faster than we could keep up with it. i spend a lot of time looking at the sky. we have a couple major airports in our area as well as a national guard base. i have seen a lot of lights from all kinds of aircraft, and this was the first time i've looked up and questioned anything i have ever seen before. my friend was in as much surprise as myself. it defied all logic of modern aircraft that i have witnessed. it was as large as a 747, yet behaved like a slow helicopter with no sound. i would love to know if anyone else in the area saw anything similar.
content.summary: Stationary triangle banked in front of us then glided away

content.detailedDescription:
I was setting up to take a series photos of the moon and venus setting over the horizon from my deck.  i was planning on experimenting with photo overlays as i just purchased the new adobe cs3 and am new to photoshop and was going to use this series of photos to learn how to use it.  i took about 20 shots with canon eos 5d digital slr.  i have not used the raw format in my camera so was this was going to be a learning experience for me.

camera was set on tripod with shutter release attached.  camera settings were iso 1600, aperature 4.0, and shutter speed 2 seconds.  i took one picture every 3 minutes to document the moon and venus setting over the tree line. 

on the 6th photo, as i opened the shutter, something flew into the frame from the right.  moving right to left.  i immediately thought this was an airplane and it was going to ruin the shot.  i decided i would wait until the object moved across the frame and immediately take another one.  unexpectedly, the object just disappeared.  there was no evidence of it anywhere, the object only made it as far as what is seen in the photo and then nothing, i scanned the sky and no planes were visible anywhere in the vicinity.

by all rights this should be an airplane as this would be close to the flightpath of planes going from seattle to portland (horizon 
air flys these).  the only thing that made this strange was its sudden disappearance shortly after the shutter closed.  also, in reviewing the photo, the flight path doesn't match up to the normal path of the seattle to portland flights  (in hind-sight, i'm wishing i had set a quicker shutter speed setting).

the photos attached are unaltered.  the .Cr2 format is in raw directly from my canon camera, while the .Jpg is converted directly from photoshop.  the time stamp on the photo is one hour early from that listed in the event time as i had not changed the time setting on my camera from daylight savings yet. (event occured at 9:05 pacific).

mark sikkema
content.summary: Object entered into still frame photo then immediately disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I have recently photographed a ufo in a series of images. the sighting ocurred on wednesday the 4th at aprox. 5pm. the sighting lasted over 7 to 10 seconds. the object descrived a circular flying pathern. i am located in buenos aires, argentina. 
i do not know who to send the images to. i am confident the object appearing in the images its an aircraft, not a spaceship. if you are not interested in the images please let me know who can i contact. 
i already talked to dick knapinski from eaa ( dknapinski@eaa.Org). he said he was not able to identify the aircraft and that i should contact a more resoursefull organization (yours).

please let me know about this. i will be sending some images. the rest of them, i will hold in case its something important.
please do not share it or publish it without my consent or permition whatsoever. 
 
i would really apreciate your insight regarding this. 
 
looking forward for some answers,
thanks in advance and best wishes,

gaston.

1 - we were taking pictures (with my girlfiend) together (it was a lovely clear afternoon and suitable for it). we were at my home.

2 - my girlfriend saw it first and made me notice it.

3 4 - a spaceship. however after a couple of seconds i believed it was an experimental aircraft since it had numbers or simbols written on one of the sides and also a very strange camouflage pattern on the top side of it.
it was flying at the same speed commercial planes usually do (i have an airport next to my city (aiport international code: eze) and planes usually fly above my house in an approach pattern). 
the object described an s pattern above us. at a certain moment, it speed decreased drastically but i was not able to take pictures of that moment since i stopped to watch (not through the camera lens for a better look), however during this moments the object kept its current altitude.

5 - first my girlfriend got anxious since she believed it was the falling piece of a plane. however we soon realize it was not and we were very curious about it. at a certain moment i got really exited since i believed it was a spaceship. but everything on it made me believe it was "human made" if you wish.

6 - after describing the s manouver, it flew out of my field of view (i have my house roof covering most of my sky view).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object descrived a circular flying pathern.

content.detailedDescription: In the mid 1970's year and time unspecified by the witness they saw a moon sized object that appeared out of the sky and desceded hovering within 10 feet above the car. route 31 sanborn ny. the individual was very nervous discussing the incident.No electromagnetic effects reported. the car worked fine. they were terrified of the object. the sighting took place where nccc property is located today.The object descended, was stationery hovering above the car-then took off straight into the air. the individual was highly agitated over the event sighting family ridicule. still is afraid of the family ridicule stating the mother was very difficult to discuss the event with and verbally abusive in ridicule. this person attended a speaker presentation by stanton friedman when they decided to discuss the event with me. this event was not the first sighting. there was another sighting of a "dwarf plane" they had seen in the past. i gave them my number to discuss the event further. no other contact by this person has been made to discuss the sighting. they were unable to give me a proper discription of the object though it was 10 feet from them. just said it looked like a small plane.I have questions about this case especially since the fear factor was so prevalent. of all the people i have ever spoken to about sightings this person was the most nervous having a high degree of fear and anxiety exhibited in her face, body language and spoken communications.
content.summary: Sighting of object seen at nccc college 10 feet from car

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my car getting ready to go to scool when i saw a metallic looking diamond shaped onject stood, hovering, above my house. it was just starting to get light outside but there were lights under the object that i could see at each of the four corners. these were not ordinary lights. they had a blueish tint and they were extrememly bright.I stood there watching for three minutes or so when the object suddenly started going straight up into the air at a slow pace. it drifted directly above me and then on across my street. it was about one hundred feet off the ground now. it suddenly plunged into the ground without leaving a single trace. it only left behind a small bit of metallic object which is sitting in my garage right now. it is extrememly sturdy but very light. i would like an explanation of what this was and what this material is that is in my garage.
content.summary: A huge diamond shaped object hovered about ten feet above my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was just about ready to go to bed when i heard a faint whirring noise from somewhere. i looked all around the house and then realised it was probably the heating and the pipes outside. i went outside to check and looked up to see the pipe when i noticed a grayish blue disc shape at a high altitude above my house. at first i thought it was some kind of plane or star. i was fascinated watching it as every few seconds it glowed bright blue. it must have been massive because at the height that it was, i could still see it spinning, and the whirring was still there. after 2-3 minutes it began to move from left to right over and over again. and then i realised what it could have been and i couldnt believe what i was seeing. i mean, i was shocked to see this huge disc thing. it began to speed up from left to right and back again when i backed up to get a better look, it glowed really bright white and then it was gone. i went back inside and havent stopped thinking about it since!
content.summary: Ufo hovering over my house at 2 in the morning.....Wierd whirring noises

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving towards annapolis, md on us route 50 east at 10:30 am on april 14th it was sun shining, clear and cold outside.  i looked up to my 1:00 position and saw something flash.  so i bent down a little to get a better look and i saw an orb just hovering in the sky.  as i was watching, it immediately zipped from the 1:00 position to the 4:00 position in a split second and stopped dead in it's tracks.  

it happened extremely fast and moved roughly 500 yards south in a split second. it was now in my 3:00-4:00 position.  i happened to have my digital camera with me and using fast thinking i grabbed it and snapped a quick photo.  the orb made no noise, nothing was seen around it and it was just hovering in the sky.  it isn't a weather balloon because balloons don't move like that, nor was it a plane or bird or blimp.  

i pulled off at an exit about 3 to 5 miles outside of annapolis near a town called crownsville, md and got out.  i didn't see the object any longer.  i got home and checked my camera and sure enough, there it was.  my windshield is dirty, so i put a red arrow pointing out the object.  otherwise, the picture has not been edited or enhanced in any way.  keep looking up !
content.summary: Orb seen zipping around while i was driving towards annapolis.

content.detailedDescription:
Sky conditions were mostly clear with scattered clouds in the vicinity. the lighting was twilight and visibility was at least 30 miles. i was looking south toward whidbey island nas through a pair of 30x77 astronomical binoculars. i had spotted a very bright red blinking light moving very slowly in an easterly direction. at first i thought i was looking at a military helicopter that was flying in the vicinity of the naval air station. but the longer i looked at the object through my binoculars i realized it wasn't a helicopter as i had never seen aircraft with the lighting configuration i was looking at. i am a commercial pilot with 23,000 hours in airline operations and am familar with aircraft lights. this object had a very bright red blinking light and below the red light there was some structure that separated the red light from a dimmer smaller steady white light. red and green navigation lights were not seen. 
the other thing that was strange was the flight path the object was following. when i first spotted the object it was west of the nas and was flying in an easterly direction. it was moving vey slowly in a very slight sine wave type motion. after watching it for about five minutes it suddenly stopped, immediately reversed direction and shot straight up a few hundred feet, then stopped again and sat motionless for a few moments.
then what it did next really got my attention. it accelerated very rapidly in an easterly direction to a position that almost put it out of my sight behind a hill. it stopped suddenly, sat motionless for a few seconds and resumed a slow steady flight in an easterly direction when it disappeared from my view behind a hill.
the next thing i noticed was a fast flying aircraft departed whidbey nas and immediately turned to fly a course south that put it in the vicinity of where i had initially spotted the object. 
i could not tell how far the object was from my position, what it's approximate size was, or even what altitude it was at. but at the time i estimated that it was several miles south of the nas and was quite low to the ground. i did notice that when it accelerated rapidly to the east i noticed a very small dim whit light appear in front of the red blinking in the direction it was flying and when the object suddlenly stopped i didn't notice the small white light anymore. also, the aircraft that had departed whidbey nas appeared to fly a straight course to the southeast in the general vicinity of where i had seen the object but it continued flying a steady course but did not appear to climb very high it eventually flew out of sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright red blinking light on top of smaller white steady light

content.detailedDescription:
the major sighting was on april 16th, but i saw it first on april 9th at 9:40 pm cst.  i was checking on my horses, on our 3 1/2 acres in collins, mo., because one is close to foaling.
what made me notice this was a bright red light that caught my attention at tree level, just north east of our property. there are frequent helicopters flying over our house because we are in line for the life flight from one small hospital to the bigger ones in springfield, mo, but this was not a helicopter. 
i tried to dismiss it as an airplane, but there was no noise and it was as bright as the cell tower lights south of our property. then, a few seconds later, 4 or 5 bright orange lights started lighting up from left to right (about 1 second each) and going out about the time the third light in a row lit. that was a little north of the red light (as though it was moving very slowly to the north). then the orange lights lit up again, a little farther north but not very much, (if i had to guess how far they were from the first red light i'd say they moved about 10 feet? over a period of 5 seconds? with each lighting. 
this time there were 5 or 6 bright orange lights. these went left to right too, only the last couple, sort of went around the object, as though it was a circular object. 
these orange lights were, i thought, sort of computer looking more rectangular than the ones on the 16th. i did see them from a different angle than the ones my husband and i saw on the night of the 16th. if they moved north, as they seemed to with each string they moved very slowly. 
these lights did the same thing that the first set of orange ones did, they went out about the time that the third light was coming on. i ran to the house to get my cell phone, hoping to take a picture of it, looking back as i ran to see if it was still there, and it was not. i check my horses every 30 min to 1 hr, and kept looking but it did not come back. i was alone that night, because my husband is a truck driver. i was excited to see it,but a little frightened because i was alone.
on april 16th though, he was home and he saw the lights with me. we got our video camera out just in time to catch the last couple of times it lit up, but couldn't get a very good shot at it. my husband was filming in night vision on the first light that he caught,(which was the last two strings that we saw) and didn't get the focus very well. the light showed up as white, on the night vision setting.  the next shot he got was on regular vision and he focused in on the last two of a string of four of the orange lights just before they went out. 

     the sighting of april 16th was virtually the same thing as i had seen the week before, red light started and went out, then the orange lights began lighting up left to right, then one time they lit up right to left. also the lights looked more like orange fireball shaped flares but they didn't go up or down or anywhere but out. 
again they lit up left to right, about one second apart at first ,but, on one string of them  they lit up a little faster and went in the direction like it was going around an object, and the last few lights in that string were closer together (my husband said it was like the lights were forming a sort of arrow). 
this night, april 16th, the sighting was longer, more light strings (that's what they seemed to be doing, stringing left to right, with a little curve at the end), and some differences in the color of the lights.  
the first ones were in the north east again, they didn't seem to be moving north like the ones on the night of the 9th, there were different amount of lights in each string, one having three orange lights, and one having one, and one having 9 or 10 (the one that my husband thought looked like an arrow, it pointed ese)almost like a code. 
then we saw a little later, more yellowish orange lights with with more white forming a string of three lights straight east of us (these ones are the ones that showed up white in the night vision shot). then 4 more orange lights more in the north east again (these are the ones that he got a shot of the last two lighting up,(as though there were two ufo's signalling to each other really close to each other or one very big one with lights going in the south end and the north end at different times) nothing made any noise!
we could not see the source of these lights at all, but, it blocked out the lights that usually sillouette the tree line east of our house. that would be about 1/2 to 1/4 of a mile span. we could not see any stars in that area, and usually we can see a few dim ones. the source of these lights would have had to be black, big and flat, if the lights were coming from a craft of some sort.
then my husband saw a red light in the timber behind our neighbor's house which is east of us (closer to the ground) i saw a white light at the time he saw the red one closer to the ground in the timber. then the last thing i saw, which no one else saw, was an orange fireball shoot right over the roof of our neighbor's house (east of us)from ssw to ene.
we had put the video camera on the charger by that time and my father and mother-in-law had come to watch the light show. they got there too late to see anything except what we had taped. this sighting lasted about an hour. then it just stopped, no noise, no lights nothing.
i did hear though the next day, that someone who lives east and south of us several miles also saw weird lights in the sky about the same time that we saw these.
neither one of us has ever seen anything quite like this before.
i have seen the big black triangle thing with the round lights on each of the three corners while driving a truck at night, and i have seen a very long silver "rod" shaped cylinder over my father and mother-in-law's house during the day several years ago, among other things. but not that anyone else ever saw at the same time that i did, so i never reported them. this time, there was another witness, and we got it on video.
i don't know how to attach video clips or sketches to this report, but i did call the st. clair county sheriff's dept. and reported the sighting of april 16th and what i thought was the previous sighting of the "thursday" night ones that i saw alone. i keep a dated and timed hour by hour diary of my horses progress through the last stages of her pregnancy,i had writen what i saw in that diary. after giving copies of my notes of those lights sighted on april 9th (still thinking it was the previous thursday) i realized that the date that i jotted it down in the horse diary was april 9th. one week to the day before the april 16th sighting. 
the deputy mr. couch, didn't take the tape because he said that there wasn't enough on the tape to show anything. i told him that this wasn't a joke, after he said he didn't know what he was going to do with a report like this, and declining to take the video tape. i'll never report things like this to the sheriff's office again in st. clair county. i told him that i wasn't a kook, that i was an rn. and that i knew the sheriff, and the officer in the next small town north of us, and that they knew me personally, but that didn't seem to matter to him!
i wish i hadn't called it in now!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Start with red lite then orange lites lighting up left to right then going out hovering in our back yard practically

content.detailedDescription:
I was on watch at the uscg station watchtower at yaqina lifeboat station, newport,or. the watchtower is located at the present lighthouse museum and parking lot north side of the newport state park, newport, or. the sightings began about 2300 pm, i was not the person who seen the objects at first, we are mainly concerned during owr watch time  for things at seaward (west) and at the inlet of yaquina bay (west) in case of any emergency that may occur that the coast guard may be needed in the event of rescue efforts. there were people parked at the parking lot below the watchtower who started seeing the objects in the eastern horizon, they banged on the tower legs and got my attention, they were asking me if i was seeing them, i said no but i would scan the eastern horizon to try and see what they were refering to. it took a few moments before i spotted the objects and then i called the xo/co at the base facilities what i was observing. the co came to the tower and observed what was going on, left the tower that i was to stay on watch until notified to do something else. my watch was to be relieved at 2400 hrs but i elected to remain with the new watchman to watch the objects that were in the eastern horizon. apparently the co called the airforce to investigate, jets went to the area and they dissappeared when they were in the area but returned as soon as they left. some were of yellow color others were an orange color. some were larger than others and they move back and forth in the sky, staying in the eastern portion of the newport, or area from the park area i was at. when the jets went in the general area they went out one at a time, returning nearly in the same area after the jets went away. by early morning, around 0200 am there were quite a few people in the area, parking lot and other viewpoints to see these objects, there were as many as twelve and as little as three at a time in the eastern horizon, changing directions at various time for whatever reason.
   the news media in portland, or broadcasted the event that late evening which several people drove to the coast to observe the incident(and the increase of people i seen after 0200 am in the general area) which lasted until nearly 0500am, which one by one they dissappeared from view. it was amazing to me how long they stayed in the area. i added everything i observed, as did the other watch personnel in our log books. several days later airforce personnel asked us to write down all that was viewed on prepared forms. a few years ago i went back to the uscglbs at yaquina to see the entrys, since i am a retired uscg and asked permission to see the old logbooks, which was granted, they were missing from the records they still had at the station, in fact a period of several months before and after all log books were gone and no explanation where they were. i was able to get news articles and a few people remembered the event...It was a night that has never left my memory and still cannot say exactly what it was. since i observe many things during my career until retiring it was only one of two events that i cannot explain away as normal objects i encountered during my lifetime, they were not normal in any sence of the concept of things, but an event that will never leave my being.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Other
content.summary: Objects appeared over eastern horizon/n/w/s/e

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside with a group of friends and family. we were all standing around my dad's friends van. well i happened to turn around. and look to my right. i look in the sky everynight just to look up there. i love the stars. i thought when i first seen it. "this is not normal!" i told my cousin "do you see that out there?" he said "yea!" i said "i wonder what that is." everyone seen it too. i knew than it couldn't be no airplane or anything like that. i went closer to the road to look. and you can see a redlight flashing on it. my cousin got some binoculars, being that hes taller than me. he went stood on the road to get a better look. and he said it had a cone. so we knew it wus triangular. and he also said he can see that redlight flashing clearly. i could too. because when we'd just stare at it. that little part would really light up into red. this thing was orange, or it almost look like a carlight with a redlight blinking under it. when i first seen it i was amazed, wasn't scared or anything. i kept a real close eye on it. i remember as we walked to the road, that's when it start fading away. i was thinking whatever it was, knew were watching it out there. somebody said this might be a local satellite from a military base. but who knows. i don't know what this object was, but it sure was interesting. i watched this thing slowly fade away til it was a little dot in the sky, & i couldn't see it nomore, so i jus came inside for the rest of the night. that was amazing whatever it was. 

thanks for reading my story!
content.summary: Whatever it was. was in the sky for 20 minutes & 10 minutes into watching on it. it shifted.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the movie "go figure" when i glanced out the window and saw colored fuzzy circles circling around a single spot.The circles alternated colors in this order:pink,green,purple,blue.When i first looked out the window i thought it was my uncle shooting a beam of light in the sky,but i realized he was in his house.They circles seemed to mov.But at the same time,seemed to occasionally teleport.Then it headed in the opposite direction,and beamed off in that direction.I was compelled to be near the ufo,and i once took a quiz by dr. marilyn ruben in a book that told me i have been abducted but didn't know it.
content.summary: Large colored fuzzy circles began circling arounda single spot in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On monday, april 16th at approximately 11:39 pm est i was standing on the deck at my home on the east side of indianapolis. the back of my home faces south, i was facing north towards the back of my house and as i was talking to my fiance' on the phone i noticed an inbound commercial aircraft coming towards me from the northeast, on approach to indianapolis international airport, at approximately 2000-3000 feet(we see a lot of commercial air traffic both inbound and outbound since we are inside the 465 beltway). as i glanced up at the aircraft passing overhead i noticed what appeared to be an opaque boomerang shaped object passing just underneath the commercial jet, from south to north in a straight line, very quickly and quietly. the object was unlit and had no distinguishing markings.  the shape of the object was one large eliptical in the front but the wings were semi elipticals on each side meeting in the middle.  compared to the size of the jet passing over, it was approximately 1/3 the size at that altitude although i cannot determine the actual distance the object was from the aircraft. the color of the sky was a light bluish haze because of the amount of light pollution from the ground but the skies were clear and starry so the object was clearly visible. as the object quickly passed overhead just north of my home it made a very sharp right turn at almost 90 degrees and sped off towards the east in the general direction of greenfield, indiana. i lost contact of the object due to extreme light pollution on the horizon in that direction.  the entire event occurred in just a matter of seconds.  i was in shock and couldn't believe what i had just witnessed and as i spoke to my fiance' i conveyed to her those exact details. i'm a navy vet of 21 years and have seen a lot of aircraft from all the branches of the military and i worked for the department of homeland security, transportation security administration at indianapolis international airport and have obseverd numerous civilian aircraft as well and this was like nothing i've ever seen. i don't know if anyone else in the area has seen anything like this or if any reports have been made since i feel fortunate to have seen it based on the objects nearly transparent appearance.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped opaque in color and silent
